        public static java.lang.String sanitizeAppIdentifier(java.lang.String appIdentifier)
                                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sanitizes an app identifier or throws an exception if it can't be sanitized.
        Parameters:
        appIdentifier - the app identifier to sanitize
        Returns:
        the sanitized app identifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the app identifier can't be sanitized because of unrecoverable input character errors

                                      throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Converts a map of parameters to a HTML form entity.
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters
        Returns:
        an URL-encoded form string ready for use in a HTTP post
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - when your system does not know how to handle the UTF-8 charset

      • convertAppIdentifierToGuid

        public static java.lang.String convertAppIdentifierToGuid(java.lang.String appIdentifier)
                                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sanitizes an app identifier and adds dashes to it so that it conforms to the instrumentation key format of Application Insights.
        Parameters:
        appIdentifier - the app identifier to sanitize and convert
        Returns:
        the converted appIdentifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the app identifier can't be converted because of unrecoverable input character errors

      • isEmulator

        public static boolean isEmulator()
        Determines whether the app is running on aan emulator or on a real device.
        Returns:
        YES if the app is running on an emulator, NO if it is running on a real device

        Parameters:
        date - the date object to be formatted
        Returns:

      • sessionTrackingSupported

        public static boolean sessionTrackingSupported()
        Determines if Session is possible for the current user or not.
        Returns:
        YES if app runs on at least OS 4.0
